name: Cave People
description:
In this action platformer game, you play as child that was living on the edge and tried to escape her family and run away to fight the monster she thought was causing trouble in her family. What she found was not what she was expecting.
Fight different types of enemies and mechanics through the levels. Using a sword and shield based combat, you have to reach your goal: Find and face the monster to save your family.

Featuring:
  • Stylized pixel-art;
  • 50 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity;
  • A action platformer game with a stunning and polished game feel;
  • Tight controls - optmized controls for gamepads and keyboards;
  • Original Soundtrack;
